text:
"True Mates?" Her voice came out in a whisper, her voice ringing out softly.
Jane stepped closer, her hand raising to rest on Nova's cheek. She let herself lean into the contact, taking in a breath of something that was just Jane. Pine and something dark was her scent and she would remember it forever. This was who she was meant to be with. Jane was hers, and suddenly, staying in this universe didn't seem as terrifying as it did before.
"You were the one I was meant to find."
"You'll have me for as long as you want me."
A grin on her face, she let the blonde pull her into a kiss. Her lips felt as soft as they looked and clearly Jane was the dominant one and Nova let her control the kiss. She tasted of warmth and someone sweet. She let herself fall into a trance as they kissed, for once the whole not needing to breath came in handy. She could just kiss her all day.
trans:
"Amigas de verdade?", a voz dela saiu como um cochicho, a voz dela ecoava gentilmente.
Jane se aproximou, a mão dela levantou para encostar na bochecha de Nova. Ela se deixou apoiar no contato, respirando algo que era apenas de Jane. O pinho e algo escuro eram a sua essência e ela se lembraria disso para sempre. Era com essa pessoa que era para ela estar. Jane era dela, e de repente, ficar nesse universo não parecia tão terrível como antes.
"Era você que eu precisava encontrar."
"Você me terá enquanto me quiser."
Com um sorriso no rosto, ela deixou a loira puxá-la para um beijo. Os lábios dela eram tão macios quanto pareciam e era óbvio, Jane era a dominante e Nova permitiu que ela conduzisse o beijo. Ela tinha gosto de calor e de alguém doce. Ela se deixou cair em transe enquanto se beijavam, pela primeira vez a falta de necessidade de respirar veio a calhar. Ela poderia beijá-la o dia todo.
